import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { ToastContainer } from 'react-toastify'; import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; import { FaLock, FaUser, FaShieldAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Login = ({ onSubmit, loading }) => { const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({ username: '', password: '' }); const [rememberMe, setRememberMe] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { setCredentials({ ...credentials, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); onSubmit(credentials, rememberMe); }; return (

Security Login

Sign in to manage the Lost & Found items at PICT College

setRememberMe(!rememberMe)} className="h-4 w-4 text-blue-600 focus:ring-blue-500 border-gray-300 rounded" />
Forgot password?

This login page is exclusively for authorized security personnel.
If you found an item, please submit it to the nearest security office.

); }; export default Login;
